short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance the learning experience with ScreenBeam wireless display and classroom orchestration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ScreenBeam Classroom Commander for Chromebook combines wireless display with student device orchestration to improve lesson flow and collaboration. Teachers are untethered from the classroom display to create an agile learning environment by moving freely and interacting with students without interrupting instruction. Combining all the benefits users come to expect from a premium ScreenBeam wireless display experience, Classroom Commander gives students and teachers an untethered learning experience to share, collaborate, present, and interact together, while teachers maintain complete control of the classroom.
Key Features

   - Present teacher or student screen wirelessly
   - Monitor student screens and active applications in real-time
   - Preview student screen before sharing on classroom display
   - Command attention by blanking student screens and locking keyboards
   - Launch browsers to designated URLs

General Requirements

    - ScreenBeam 1000 EDU receiver
    - Classroom Commander Chrome Extension
    - Classroom Commander App (for Student)
    - Classroom Commander Connectivity Server

For more details, visit: https://www.screenbeam.com/products/screenbeam-classroom-commander/
